reporter_caption.center: PFEFFER v. BUFFALO RAILWAY COMPANY, 144 N.Y. 636 (1894)

caption.center: HENRY L. PFEFFER, Respondent, v. THE BUFFALO RAILWAY COMPANY, Appellant.

court.center: Court of Appeals of the State of New York.

opinion.attorneys:
C.S. Crosser for appellant.
George W. Cothran for respondent.
opinion.opinion_text:
Agree to affirm; no opinion.
All concur.
Judgment affirmed.
